channel.title: [Hyperion] Fixing Enter Name Packet Handler [Hyperion]
channel.description:
Someone may need this so just decided to release;
In your constants class.
In your packet sizes array you will see something like
[code=java5]0, 8, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, //60[/code]
Change the first 0 in the line to:
[code=java5]8, 8, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, //60[/code]
